description:
'''Elmo Kennedy O'Connor''' (born January 11, 1994), known professionally as '''BONES''', is an American rapper, singer and songwriter from [[Howell, Michigan]]. He is also the founder of the music collective TeamSESH.

O'Connor is known for his pioneering work in sub-genres of hip-hop referred to as [[emo rap]] and [[trap metal]]. Since 2010, O'Connor has released an extensive discography and developed a large fan base. As of 2024, he has released over 100 albums, mixtapes and [[Extended play|EPs]] across several aliases.
